Reviews.Title: mobile app does not work.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Lee
Reviews.Content: Product itself is fine, however after numerous tries and attempts to get the mobile app to work it still fails to connect via my mobile device which is the whole reason why I bought the device.

Reviews.Title: Works great, decent range too
Reviews.Author: SM
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an add on camera to the Lorex BB4325X bundle with the PTZ Camera, Wifi Cradle and Handheld monito.  See my review of that product for more details.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Works great. Love that it can pan, tilt, zoom. Has two way microphone as well. Bought as a second camera for lorex share and care monitor system.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera, but...
Reviews.Author: Christopher G.
Reviews.Content: Picture is okay.  Sound is not good.  The iPhone application is not very useful, and even with a fast connection the Lorex system does not functionally benefit us.  Maybe it's me...Make sure that you are ready to mount this camera on the wall (we don't really want to) or put it on a bookcase that is high enough to see inside of the crib....

Reviews.Title: Good, but not good enough
Reviews.Author: W. Lee
Reviews.Content: I used this camera as an addition to the BB3521 set. The camera quality is pretty clear; I personally have not tried to take a picture with the monitor yet, but I'm assuming it would be low resolution. There is a delay in the P/T function of the camera, as is with most mid range cams. My biggest complaint would be that when you use the digital zoom, its as if the camera has to reset itself. It delays before zooming (X2); more importantly when you zoom in you have no idea where you are. It does not zoom in where you were originally centered, and I find maneuvering in digital zoom mode tiresome. For comparison, we have a 5 yr old Summertime baby monitor set, and when you zoom in it zooms in immediately where you are looking.Pros:- Smooth white blends in with the background of my white wall.- Still viewing of camera is quite clearCons:- Zoom is horrendous- Lags when Pan and Tilting- Power cord is a little shortOverall, still good enough for its use!

Reviews.Title: LOREX  BB351 AC 1B.PAN/TILT ACCESSORY
Reviews.Author: concerned mom
Reviews.Content: IT IS COMFORTING THAT I DONT HAVE TO GET UP TO CHECK TO ON MY BABY DURING THE NIGHT, AND IT CAN BE ADJUSTED FROM THE MONITOR.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pan Tilt & Zoom Camera with Motion Tracking - pan, tilt, or zoom-in manually using your monitor OR activate Motion Tracking to have the camera automatically follow your child.
Crystal Clear Night Vision - black-and-white video coverage records your child's every twist and turn overnight.
Two-Way Talk... speak directly to your baby through the monitor's built-in microphone. Nothing sounds more soothing than mommy or daddy's voice!
Built-In Nightlight... comfort your infant if he or she wakes during the night with a little glow above the crib.
Expandable up to 4 Cameras - add more cameras to your CARE 'N' SHARE collection to view four feeds on one compact monitor.
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex BB351AC1B Baby Care N Share Pan/Tilt Add-on Accessory (White)
